attributes.name: Microsoft 365 Exchange Safe Link Policy Disabled v101.0.0
attributes.description: Identifies when a Safe Link policy is disabled in Microsoft 365. Safe Link policies for Office applications extend phishing protection to documents that contain hyperlinks, even after they have been delivered to a user.
author: Elastic
false_positives: Disabling safe links may be done by a system or network administrator. Verify that the configuration change was expected. Exceptions can be added to this rule to filter expected behavior.
attributes.query: event.dataset:o365.audit and event.provider:Exchange and event.category:web and event.action:"Disable-SafeLinksRule" and event.outcome:success
attributes.setup: The Office 365 Logs Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
